verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and for their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers;<s%> and they <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood<s%> in <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5769>time,<s%> even <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nachor:<s%> and they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> from the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> and <S%H3212>led<s%> him throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and I <S%H5062>plagued<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out.

And I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and you <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3990>darkness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on them, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> them; and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and you <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>season.<s%>

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> with you: and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that you might <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land;<s%> and I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3898>warred<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> you:
But I <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> therefore he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you still: so I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And you <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against you, the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites;<s%> and I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, which <S%H1644>drove<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, even the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%> but not with your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> with your <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H3021>labor,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1129>built<s%> not, and you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and olive <S%H2132>groves<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5193>planted<s%> not do you <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H8549>sincerity<s%> and in <S%H571>truth:<s%> and <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> and in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H1961>seem<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> to you to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> you will <S%H5647>serve;<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> that were on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> or the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> you <S%H3427>dwell:<s%> but as for me and my <S%H1004>house,<s%> we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that we should <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> he it is that <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and <S%H8104>preserved<s%> us in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> we <S%H1980>went,<s%> and among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> we <S%H5674>passed:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1644>drove<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> therefore will we <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for he is our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> You <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he is an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> he is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> he will not <S%H5375>forgive<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> nor your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> then he will <S%H7725>turn<s%> and do you <S%H7489>hurt,<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> you, <S%H310>after<s%> that he has done you <S%H3190>good.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> You are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against yourselves that you have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him. And they <S%H559>said,<s%> We are <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away,<s%> said he, the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will we <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> will we <S%H8085>obey.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H6965>set<s%> it up <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H427>oak,<s%> that was by the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall be a <S%H5713>witness<s%> to us; for it has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to us: it shall be therefore a <S%H5713>witness<s%> to you, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H3584>deny<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>depart,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in <S%H8556>Timnathserah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> that <S%H748>outlived<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> they in <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> in a <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>silver:<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in a <S%H1389>hill<s%> that pertained to <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> him in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>
